import React, { Component } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import {loadYData} from '../../../store/actions/youtube'; export class Recent extends Component { render() { return (

Related

{this.props.ydata?this.props.ydata.map((data)=>{ this.props.history.push(`/watch?v=${data.videoId}`)}>
{data.title} {data.viewCount} views Published {data.publishedAt} }) : "No videos found"}
) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ isLoading: state.youtube.isLoading, ydata: state.youtube.ydata, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, {loadYData})(Recent)
